info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 27 at 12:42AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jo Daviess, Carroll, southern Stephenson, southeastern Jackson and northeastern Clinton Counties through 115 AM CST... At 1241 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sabula, or 12 miles west of Mount Carroll, moving east at 75 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Savanna around 1245 AM CST. Mount Carroll around 1250 AM CST. Lanark around 100 AM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Shannon and German Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
